column1: Term GDPR specific statuses in dpv-gdpr

column3: Status or state associated with being lawful or legally compliant regarding GDPR
State of being lawful or legally compliant for GDPR
State of being unlawful or legally non-compliant for GDPR
State where lawfulness or compliance with GDPR is unknown
The evaluation of whether processing is proportional and in balance with impact to rights
The systematic and extensive evaluation of personal aspects
